sentence.Network_en: His father is a noted trumpeter, composer and bandleader.
sentence.Network_cn: 他父亲是个著名的号手、作曲家和乐队指挥。

sentence.Network_en: Their father a bandleader and their mother taught harmony singing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的父亲是伴舞乐队的指挥,他们的母亲教授合唱.

sentence.Network_en: He was the first white bandleader to adopt and popularize a jazz style.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是第一个创建和普及一种爵士风格的白人乐队领队.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... banditti 匪徒 bandleader 乐队指挥 bandmaster 首度.

entry.tran: （尤指爵士乐的）乐队指挥，乐队领队
entry.def: A bandleader is the person who conducts a band, especially a jazz band.

example.tran: 著名的号手、作曲家和乐队指挥

means.word_mean: 1. the leader of a dance band

auth_sentence.content: Showcasing bandleader Bosco Mann's soulful writing, Soul Time!
auth_sentence.res_content: Showcasing bandleader Bosco Mann's soulful writing, Soul Time!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Showcasing bandleader Bosco Mann's soulful writing, Soul Time!

auth_sentence.content: He also describes his own evolution from band member to bandleader.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also describes his own evolution from band member to bandleader.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also describes his own evolution from band member to bandleader.

auth_sentence.content: Each a great virtuoso, composer, and bandleader in their own right.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each a great virtuoso, composer, and bandleader in their own right.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each a great virtuoso, composer, and bandleader in their own right.
